entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy and ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
